ygData.subject: Re: Trakanon was [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I think a lot of people have got close to him now. Our guild spent a day trying to pull his guards. On The Rathe a couple of guilds got in and did pull them
ygData.messageBody:
I think a lot of people have got close to him now. Our guild spent a day
trying to pull his guards. On The Rathe a couple of guilds got in and
did pull them because Trak was missing from his lair that day, which is
odd to say the least unless a gm /killed him. He hits for over 600 a
swing so it will be a while before anyone manages to kill him.


On Fri, Jun 02/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> Out of curiosity, has anyone fought Trakanon? I hadn't heard anything and
> wondered if Trakanon had even been located yet. I always like to hear tales
> of mobs it's highly unlikely I will ever see.
>
> Also, I fear I may have zoned into Dalnir when I went LD last nite from what
> I heard from a friend. Is it reasonably easy to get out of Dalnir once you
> get in?
>
> Kitasi the curious
